PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2013-06132013-05-30,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ND
ActNational Defence Act
SubjectQueen's Regulations and Orders for the Canadian Forces
PrecisRegulations Amending the QUEEN'S REGULATIONS AND ORDERS FOR THE CANADIAN FORCES in order to (1) comply with the staturory amendments regarding parole ineligibility brought forward by Bill C-48; (2) amend and clarify new and existing rights of appeal; and (3) deal with administrative or technical matters.
RegistrationRegistration: UNR/
AttachmentsAttachment
